name: Twitter Hash Tag Widget
author: Brad Williams

sections.description:
A widget for displaying the most recent twitter status updates for a particular hash tag.

Upgrade

  1. Use the plugin updater in WordPress or…
  2. Delete the previous twitter-hash-tag-widget folder from the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Upload the new twitter-hash-tag-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

Usage

  1. Install.
  2. Activate.
  3. Add to your active widgets at Appearance->Widgets and configure.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the twitter-hash-tag-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install directly through the plugin installer.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress or by using the link provided by the plugin installer.
sections.changelog:
1.1 (2009-06-28):

  • Add backwards compatibility for PHP versions not containing JSON support

1.0 (2009-06-04):

  • Initial Public Release
